title: Lowest Bribery Incidence
description: In 2019, only 0.2% of firms in Cyprus reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Highest Female Persistence to Grade 5
description: In 2021, 100% of female students in Cyprus persisted to grade 5, indicating full retention at this educational level.

title: Highest Female Persistence to Last Grade of Primary
description: In 2021, Cyprus achieved a 100% persistence rate for female students reaching the last grade of primary education.

title: Lowest Poverty Headcount Ratio
description: In 2021, only 0.1% of the population in Cyprus lived below the $8.30 a day poverty line, one of the lowest poverty rates worldwide.
